website_summaries.verdict: If are looking for a crisp, clean scent that offers a nice blend of florals, this popular Versace scent is for you.
pros: Fans of Versace perfume love this popular scent for its versatile wear for day or night, thanks to the floral notes with just a touch of sweetness and musk
cons: If you aren't a fan floral scents, it may seem to strong for your tastes
Rare concerns of long-time wearers receiving perfume that smelled "off

customer_reviews.title: Not real one
customer_reviews.text: This is not real one, I compared the old one that I bought. You can see the right side of bottle after I used all, the mark words still there and clear, but the right side of the bottle, I only used couple of months, but the mark words all disappeared. I felt the smell is different. Really need to be careful about get a fake product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is FAKE.
customer_reviews.text: This is not authentic Versace. It smells differently and does not last, too much alcohol in it. I bought a few ones from Macy's after and they smell nice.
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Beware of fakes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received a fake product... Clearly fake as pictured next to the real product (real on the left). There was almost no scent, and what was there smells nothing like it's supposed to. I've been wearing bright crystal for ten years so it was obvious to me. For some reason I can't leave seller feedback so I'm trying to leave a warning on the product at least.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baum

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand since couple of years, I always got it from a perfumery. This one from Amazon is definitely not the real fragrance. This one is fake! The smell is not the same and it seems to have way more alcohol in it.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fake perfume. I have the real perfume I bought from an authorized seller as well and compared to it this smells like pure rubbing alcohol. I will NOT be making the mistake of buying this again. What a joke. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL 😇
customer_reviews.text: Ohhhhhhh Lawdy!!! This is absolutely beautiful!! Such a beautiful fragrance! Wasn't expecting the bottle to be so big. This is a wonderful product and I'm glad I purchased it! The bottle I have is not fake it smells just like the one in Macy's. Delivery was on point, packaging was excellent! This is absolutely one of the best products I have ever purchased off Amazon. 😇😘😘
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: No Strong Scent
customer_reviews.text: Was this an exceptionally light perfume for anyone else? It seemed really watered down and was not to be smelt three minutes after application.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Z

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, not a knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent; have been wearing it for awhile now and always get compliments. Took a gamble purchasing from Amazon to get the cheaper price (I’ve bought other perfumes on here that definitely turns out to be knockoffs) but this one seems like the real deal. Lasting scent that smells like the bottle I got from department stores.
customer_reviews.author: MWill

customer_reviews.title: Classy Perfume
customer_reviews.text: Versace Bright Crystal is a lovely perfume! It's has a sophisticated sexy scent. It's on the floral end so it's perfect for daytime wear because it's light and clean smelling as opposed to musky. If you are searching for a noticeable perfume but not too overwhelming, you may like this perfume. I would like to point out that it last anywhere between 4 to 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Lotion, not shower gel as pictured
customer_reviews.text: It does not come with the shower gel as pictured above. It came with lotion. I wouldn’t have purchased it if I knew it was lotion. Also, it is not in plastic wrap, comes already in an opened box.
customer_reviews.author: jayne l.

customer_reviews.title: Real Versace Bright Crystal
customer_reviews.text: I was really concerned about buying this product because of so many reviews saying it was fake. When I recited the package I was sceptical and had it in my mind I was going to get ripped off. However I was so happy to see that this was actual Versace perfume. It’s been my all time favorite for years now. I sprayed the bottle I got from kohl’s on one arm and sprayed the bottle I received from amazon on the other and they are the exact same. This perfume is a great gift for perfume lovers !!! Thank you Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keli Sheedy

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This product is fake don’t buy it. I got this as a gift for my mom and she had the real Versace perfume the packaging is a little different and the smell is different from the real one and I thought I was getting this at a discount.. my mistake that I will never do again. Just a heads up.. good price but not the real stuff. It also burned my moms chest and neck when she applied it. I don’t know the real ingredients because fake manufacturers don’t always put the actual Ingredients that are in the product on the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Dana

customer_reviews.title: I love this scent
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent. It is very sweet and not too overpowering. I typically spritz about 5 times(neck and wrists). I get complimented on it by my boyfriend and once or twice by people sharing an enclosed space (elevator, LYFT driver). Mild scent, perfect for daily use!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: No the real thing
customer_reviews.text: Oh I really wish I had taken heed from the people here that said this is a fake. It just doesn't smell like the real thing. I am so disappointed and I feel ripped off because I tried to return it, but it says it can't be returned due to the nature of the product and special packaging required. Not only does it smell different and weak, but it doesn't last more that 20 minutes. Please beware. I wish I had. I want add as well that I thought I would be safer by ordering it direct from Amazon instead of through another seller. But I was mistaken. It didn't make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Happy Birthday Mom
customer_reviews.text: I know my Mom will love this. I’m glad the box isn’t small.
customer_reviews.author: Red Roses

customer_reviews.title: Don't assume your wife will like. Mine did not.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife. She simply did not like it. Says she likes sweeter smelling stuff and this is overly floral. And of course the return policy won't allow me to change it for something she does like. Figured it was my fault for not reading the description closer. But upon further review, the return policy is rather hard to find. By design no doubt. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERSACE Bright Crystal smells so good!!
customer_reviews.text: This by far is my favorite toilette spray. I received for a Christmas gift Ralph Lauren Romance but I am loving my Versace over it. It has a refreshing floral scent. Will make for the perfect Valentine, Birthday, Anniversary or Mother's day gift, she won't be disappointed. 3.0 fl oz. Will last a while because this scent lasts all day. Great value for a FANTASTIC product. Versace Bright Crystal smells so good, I highly recommend this purchase for yourself or as a gift.👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Bluster

customer_reviews.title: I dig!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the light sweet scent. Not over powering and clean. I loved this one! And the price (at least when I bought it, around $50+) was hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: Kham

customer_reviews.title: Splurge
customer_reviews.text: Perfume: Light, lasting, and elegantly feminine. Seller: Good quality, fast shipment, authentic, good packaging, and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Smell AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about the bad reviews but my experience with this perfume is awesome it smells wonderful it came nicely packaged and the bottle is so pretty this perfume smells amazing and I don’t understand like I say about the bad reviews and I’m sorry Yall had a bad experience with his perfume i had a great experience it smells so good and I’m probably gonna have to order more soon because Ima use it all in the next week lol
customer_reviews.author: Nicey

customer_reviews.title: The product I received was indeed Versace Bright Crystal so I'm very pleased. Love the sent and from Amazon the price
customer_reviews.text: I don't do reviews, but decided to leave one because of occasional speculation of authenticity. After much examination and meticulous comparison of other photos and another bottle. The product I received was indeed Versace Bright Crystal so I'm very pleased. Love the sent and from Amazon the price.
customer_reviews.author: ENorthington

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed!! I've been getting Bright Crystal from Amazon for a few years now and was very pleased. BUT the last time I received it, it was extremely disappointed. It seems like it was really watered down. The last perfume it received was definitely not the same. It makes me rethink purchasing items from Amazon if they allow this to be sold under their name.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Nieves

customer_reviews.title: It smells really good bust scent doesn't last long...
customer_reviews.text: It smells really good but scent doesn't last long. I'm having to reapply throughout the day. So I took one star for the reason. I hate that I have to use so much to keep the scent all day..but its a great scent and when I wear it my husband loves it...not sure if I'll buy again because it's to expensive for the amount I have to use daily to keep the scent on me..
customer_reviews.author: Portia Silcox

customer_reviews.title: Leaks like crazy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fragrance, but the bottle leaks out everywhere when I spray it. It leaked on my dresser and ate the varnish off. I don’t know if they is the legitimate product or not. It’s smelles like the original bottle I bought from the department store, but the sprayer leaks terribly. Such a waste and nuisance!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Don't!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't do it....they are knock-off's! Shady packaging, scent is not the same and longevity is like...3 min. As usual Amazon stepped up and put their best foot forward and return in-full.xtern
customer_reviews.author: L. Montanez

customer_reviews.title: Pure water not perfume!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE-This is pure water!!! The scent is barely there. The second you spray on it disappears. I have been using this scent for years and never had this issue purchasing elsewhere. And, I am not able to return because it is a liquid. Not happy about this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne M. Ceasar

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this smell so much. It’s so distinct but I could smell it if someone else was wearing it. I haven’t been able to find another perfume that I like this much. I suggest also buying the spray of this as well because with the roller it’s just spotting
customer_reviews.author: Destin Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Best perfume ever
customer_reviews.text: Giant bottle and smells amazing. My boyfriend IMMEDIATELY told me how amazing I smelled as soon as he came over. He said it was the most amazing perfume he had ever smelled. Everytime I wear it he talked about how nice it is.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: This is not original, it’s fake
customer_reviews.text: This is not original. It is fake and can not be returned
customer_reviews.author: Letty

customer_reviews.title: Secure wrapping and shipping that was handled with care. Thank you so much Amazon ❤️
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about all of Versace fragrance products? The presentation of the box is easy on the eyes and the fragrance make you feel like royalty. Jimmy Choo, Gicce and Versace are all high scale products that will make any female happy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lenihan

customer_reviews.title: Great clean & light - not overwhelming 💗it
customer_reviews.text: Love 💕 clean smells that make you want to breathe deeply & this is one of those- I just believe that certain brands of perfume have better quality (smell/longevity) & they are worth it - treat yourself & you’ll see too.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Fake.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it once and it was the real deal but 1 year after I bought it again and guess what? FAKE!!!! I'm definitely not buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo e Beta

customer_reviews.title: Worth my money
customer_reviews.text: I want sure about this order because who orders perfume online right? But I love it. The smell is awesome. Remember the key to smelling good is to bathe first!
customer_reviews.author: Celisse A Davis

customer_reviews.title: not a teaspoon of the real perfume in this crap. You cannot return it
customer_reviews.text: I am stunned, this is a fake product, weak and strong alcohol, not a teaspoon of the real perfume in this crap. You cannot return it, do not be fooled by it being bought on "prime".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't smell real
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this is the real deal I've bought a few bottles before from Macys and this one smells off. I still wear it because it smells good but the smell doesn't last. So if you like light smells then buy it...
customer_reviews.author: Beautyvine

customer_reviews.title: Drives my husband 😜
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good, the scent lasts all day. It’s a soft feminine scent not over powering at all Drives my husband crazy. And the price, Seriously is great!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Scented Perfume
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this perfume that my husband surprised me with. It has a delightfully light, feminine smell. The bottle is beautiful as well. I'm looking forward to wearing this for many years to come; definitely my new favorite scent.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Shine On!
customer_reviews.text: The name is on point. I felt bright wearing it. I wouldn't wear Bright Crystal to a formal dinner, but it's sassy/sexy enough to gather with friends a local pub and toast to the good people in your life. 🥳
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: A classic scent
customer_reviews.text: Versace Classic scent. Slightly rosy and clean with a crisp finish. As with the Diamond fragrance, a little more alcohol in the mix so it doesn’t last as long on the skin or clothing. Beautiful scent.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna A. Safranek

customer_reviews.title: Good perfume
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this perfume. She sucked the soul out of my dick when I gifted her this. Makes the perfect gift for just about any occasion. If you buy this for your wife you will get laid.
customer_reviews.author: pedro

customer_reviews.title: Diluted perfume!
customer_reviews.text: The bottle that I received was definitely diluted. I even took it to the store to compare products. It is lighter in color as well as less potent then the actual product sold in stores. I have been buying this for years and pretty much new it immediately, I do not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Wood

customer_reviews.title: Versace Bright Crystal Eau de Toilette Spray
customer_reviews.text: I bought this perfume for my wife because a friend recommended, wow it smells incredible - very sexy. My wife's, New favorite perfume. Highly recommend. A light to medium perfume good for day or night wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst perfume I've bought on this site. I love this Versace perfume, when it's the real thing. I've sprayed this one on and it burns my skin like rubbing alcohol and it does not smell like the real Versace. Also it leaked from the spray dispenser piece of the bottle. It leaked on my wooden dresser and left a square of discoloration under the where entire bottle was sitting on the wood. I won't ever buy this on Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Definitely fame but...
customer_reviews.text: Yep, like others have mentioned, this is definitely not the real Bright Crystal. Smell is weak and fades quickly. The scent still smells good but for the price, I would want the legitimate product. Just go to Ulta and get the real perfume there.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Did not have to wait two months to receive.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like paying for each individual order when I ordered it all at once. Yes” all 3 to 4 items. NOT HAPPY AT ALL. With your shipping and handling prices is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer. Paris NY Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite scents. I have never purchased perfume on amazon so I was a little worried it would be old and smell off. Smells great! I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: shauna

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I have ever given a negative review, but this product was awful. If I could have given it no stars, I would have. I compared it to one I received from another vendor and the smells are quite different. I love this fragrance, but was extremely disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Loris

customer_reviews.title: This has been altered in some way... ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been altered in some way.... it's not the same as all the other ones I have purchased in the past. Will not be buying from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Lovely smell affordable
customer_reviews.text: For those hard to shop people. I bet she would like it. She ended up loving it. I liked the scent and bottle. Worth the wait to open on xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift for my sister after she saw and sampled mine. She loves it. A very light and pleasant scent for those of us who don't like to be overwhelmed by fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Summer Delight
customer_reviews.text: The box is so pretty, I'm keeping it. I have Yellow Diamonds, and I was looking for a comparable summer scent. I love the lightness of the fragrance and the subtle smells of flowers. It makes me feel pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn King

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant after ordering this fragrance as it is nonreturnable. I have NO problems with this fragrance. Very happy & pleased. I have been getting many compliments asking what fragrance I'm wearing. As for longevity, I went to do laundry & could still smell this fragrance. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: *BUYER BEWARE* Fake!
customer_reviews.text: Smells like limes dipped in rubbing alcohol!! 100% not authentic! Bought from Amazon directly too... waste of money and no refunds too...
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully scented. Like fresh flowers and fruit citrus. Some woodsy & earthy fresh scents. Im glad to say the product I did recieve is 100% real. Very luxurious sexy perfume. Such a fresh beautiful fragrance. Nicely packaged. I got a 3 oz for a great deal. I'm also into dolce & gabbana rose the one which is more of an evening scent for me and versace bright crystal would be more of a daytime perfume. Both are beautiful and sexy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Does not last that long to me anyway but love the smell and got it for very cheap
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: This item is a fake, DO NOT BUY IT. You've been warned!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrive with a busted cap and leaking. When I checked the batch code, there is no such batch code under Versace. Complete fake. The fragrance is a bit pleasant and a little similar but it gets irritating because it has too much alcohol and probably other unknown irritating chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio S Lopez Espaillat

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: My fav perfume. But the spritzer is broken and showed up that way. Very disappointed. UPDATE: bought a bottle from theperfumebox.com and have now come to realize not only was this broken but it's fake. It's the second or third time I've purchased from this seller, too. No idea how they are allowed to continue selling knock offs. The difference in smell and staying power is absolutely 100% undeniable.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fresh and floral
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Would like to buy bath gel in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: HOPE

customer_reviews.title: Watered down, ripping you off!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!!!! I love this stuff but this is a rip off. It’s so watered down. I held it up to a bottle I got for Christmas and it’s like water. The scent only lasts about 5 min. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: jennifer baker

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! This is my favorite perfume.. so the price a paid was AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Meche

customer_reviews.title: Cute Bottle and Wonderful Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! IN LOVE WITH MY BOTTLE. IT'S CAN BE A CUTE GIFT. This fragrance is a favorite of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Ashayagori

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: love the price. always turn to amazon for great deals on perfumes and colognes
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Fedinchik

customer_reviews.title: Using it for years and I'll keep doing it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for years. I always, always, always receive compliments about how I smell. I really don't know or care if it's real or not. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy M

customer_reviews.title: Delightful Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I believe this scent is authentic. It has a wonderful smell and lasts a good long time. The packaging and bottle are absolutely beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this fragrance. I have it for myself and got it as a secret Santa gift.
customer_reviews.author: nchilds

customer_reviews.title: The spray was cheap and fragrance was so bad. Just strong alcohol scent
customer_reviews.text: KNOCKOFF ITEM! BEWARE. The moment I saw the bottle, I already knew it was fake. Even the PINKISH color of the perfume was obviously off. The spray was cheap and fragrance was so bad. Just strong alcohol scent. AND worse is, I can't even return it! :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: Scent is great at first, but does not last but a couple of hours. I have worn this perfume for years, but first time purchased from this seller. Disappointed and product is clearly not the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: mae190220

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite perfumes and this seller is giving amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Dijana

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this I buy a bottle twice a year for her
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Smells good.. got it as a gift. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: jason barrett

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite fragrance! It smells so good, and it has a nice light scent so that it won't bother other people.
customer_reviews.author: LovetoRead Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not real sure this is legit Versace
customer_reviews.text: I have the real stuff and this one changed after one month. To late to send back. The pink coloring settled to the bottom of vail And when shook to remix it looks like a film is sloshy around in side. It is either old or not Versace Bright Eyes. Will not buy again From this company.
customer_reviews.author: Danny R Gaydou

customer_reviews.title: Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: REAL! Love!!! This is my favorite scent. You can’t beat the price. It’s hard to find this scent where I live so I appreciated that Amazon had it.
customer_reviews.author: Auhatafe

customer_reviews.title: Where’d it go?
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent for the short time it lasts. Very watered down.
customer_reviews.author: JDLjr

customer_reviews.title: Scent does not stay.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this is more like a body spray. Scent dissipates quickly. Very disappointing for the money paid. You can't return it. Shipping was a nightmare. I never want to buy anything again from foreverlux.
customer_reviews.author: tbaby

customer_reviews.title: It is authentic
customer_reviews.text: Product is fantastic Smiles amazing it did arrive a couple of days later than we expected but it got here it was packaged well I am thoroughly pleased and I will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: High quality scent that my husband likes
customer_reviews.text: Finally a perfume I don't have a bad rash to and my husband likes as well
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fairbairn

customer_reviews.title: just go to ultra
customer_reviews.text: Not only was my item nearly a third of the way gone when it arrived in a sealed box, it definitely isn’t the real product. No refunds or exchanges.. Please don’t waste your time or hard earned money like i did.
customer_reviews.author: Cori

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this perfume, smells great and I get a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Leann

customer_reviews.title: “How did you know that’s what I wanted”?
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as an anniversary gift for my mom. Did not have time to visit department store. Solely relied upon excellent reviews to make purchase. My mom said “how did you know that’s what I wanted”?
customer_reviews.author: Robin Bagby

customer_reviews.title: The worst
customer_reviews.text: I Am so mad this is totally fake I can't believe it Smells horrible 😫 😕 😞 😩 😪 😢

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this perfume, the smell is sweet and enticing. Its seductive and last the whole day, i put it on in the morning and after i shower at night i can still smell it on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite perfume ever
customer_reviews.text: Light and feminine without being too strong or floral. Sweet smelling but not like a baked good. Lol. I get compliments all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Corby Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Legit or not ??
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, I just have a feeling... That it may not be legit. But I don't really care at this point. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful scent that lasts all day.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite perfume! Only get occasionally as a special treat for myself (or when I give my hubby puppy dog eyes). It's a very beautiful scent that lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my new perfume just what I expected the smell is perfect not too strong !
customer_reviews.author: maria vaca

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This perfume smells great, got it as a gift for my wife and i will not be buying her any other brand but this.. great product for the price its a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Cannot Be Returned
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't smell like the sample I tried. Product cannot be returned. For 50% price off, 50% off the fragrance, and 50% off how the original Bright Crystal lasted.
customer_reviews.author: camie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy  Not original
customer_reviews.text: This perfume isn’t the original.. the scent last for 10 minutes only. What a waste of money because you can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t totally full when I received it. Smell was accurate but the cap does not close all the way so it leaks. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Beekayohh

customer_reviews.title: Good price, cheaper than in the store and delivery ...
customer_reviews.text: Good price, cheaper than in the store and delivery was speedy. Bought this for my wife's birthday. We both love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: pes

customer_reviews.title: Stinkyyyyyy
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would give a minus one star because the smell is awful it literally smells like a funeral home. Worst smell ever!
customer_reviews.author: Muva C

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly lovely scent, true name brand
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful large bottle of an amazing scent. Larger than I expected. Really lovely in every way. Brand name scent that I was previously familiar with. Beautiful bottle. Perfectly packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Joellen Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't smell anything like the original and the seller conveniently doesn't offer a return option if dissatisfied. Not surprised since they're selling a knock off product. Now I'm stuck with a 50 dollar bottle of horrible smelling liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Jones

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Smells REALLY good but it does not last long.. like an hr or two and you’ll be feeling like you need to respray unfortunately :(
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Speiser

customer_reviews.title: Classic scent
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite scents, I receive so many compliments
customer_reviews.author: Shonee & Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loves the scent that lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend loved it as one of my gifts for her birthday. She says the scent lasts all day and she's really happy so I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling women’s perfume
customer_reviews.text: Versace is a great smelling perfume. One of the best I have smelled Worth the price Smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Zain syed

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one I have that I bought at the mall. Exactly what I was looking for. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann18170

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, light scent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this perfume as a Christmas gift for my son's girlfriend. Very nice, light scent. Perfect for a teenage girl.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

product_meta.title: Versace Bright Crystal Eau de Toilette Spray for Women, 3 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: Size:3 Fl OzLaunched by the design house of Gianni Versace. When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you. For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear. Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied
feature_bullets: A classic designer fragrance for Women
Perfect for gift giving on any occasion, all year round
Packaging for this product may vary from that shown in the image above
This item is not for sale in Catalina Island

This enchanting fragrance features high notes of Yuzu and Pomegranate layered over a base of musky Mahogany and Amber. Radiant, distinctly feminine Peony, Lotus and Magnolia make up the middle, for a fragrance that evokes memories of a dreamy summer on white beaches with crystal water.
